text: The Brood is a 1979 Canadian science fiction horror movie directed by David Cronenberg and starring Oliver Reed, Samantha Eggar, Art Hindle, Susan Hogan, Nicholas Campbell, Michael Magee. It was distributed by New World Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 science fiction movies Category:1979 horror movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:Movies directed by David Cronenberg
title: The Brood
